item.title: Haitian migrants at US border: 'We've been through 11 countries'
item.description: One man tells how he trekked through jungle with his young son, seeing fellow migrants' dead bodies.

item.title: Migrants freezing to death on Belarus-Poland border
item.description: The BBC finds stranded migrants facing sub-zero temperatures amid a row between Poland and Belarus.

item.title: Capitol riot committee to investigate Trump allies
item.description: The committee investigating the 6 January riot has issued the first subpoenas of the Trump team.

item.title: Catalan separatist Carles Puigdemont arrested in Italy
item.description: Spain accuses the former president of the Catalonia region of sedition, and wants him extradited.

item.title: Gabby Petito case: FBI issues arrest warrant for boyfriend Brian Laundrie
item.description: The indictment says Brian Laundrie used a debit card that did not belong to him after her death.

item.title: UK payout to bereaved Afghan family was $143
item.description: The compensation payment is one of hundreds by the Ministry of Defence, revealed for the first time.

item.title: R Kelly lawyer compares him to Martin Luther King
item.description: The defence makes its final arguments in the singer's sex-abuse trial.

item.title: Earliest definitive evidence of people in Americas
item.description: Scientists have found evidence that humans reached the Americas earlier than previously thought.

item.title: Canary Islands volcano: 'Miracle house' escapes lava
item.description: The volcano on La Palma has been erupting since Sunday, destroying hundreds of homes.

item.title: UK Covid vaccine rules cause hesitancy - Africa health boss
item.description: The UK's refusal to accept vaccine certificates from Africa could increase hesitancy, says Africa CDC.

item.title: The epic adventures of the Gilgamesh Dream tablet
item.description: How an ancient story of a superhuman king ended up in all sorts of unexpected places.

item.title: Africa's week in pictures: 17-23 September 2021
item.description: A selection of the best photos from the African continent and beyond.

item.title: Netherlands Covid: Boy wins court battle for right to jab
item.description: The 12-year-old can get vaccinated to visit his dying grandmother despite his father's objections.

item.title: Why are so many Haitians at the US-Mexico border?
item.description: Thousands of migrants are at the Texas-Mexico border. Here's what we know about why they are coming.

item.title: The other missing Americans: 'Where is their coverage?'
item.description: Keen public interest in the Gabby Petito case has renewed the urgency of other missing person cases.

item.title: Little Boots says Abba's new live band is 'badass cool'
item.description: The pop star is joining Abba's live band next year, after crowd-funding her sparkling new album.

item.title: Singapore migrant workers are still living in Covid lockdown
item.description: The workers in Singapore are enduring one of the longest Covid confinement periods in the world.

item.title: German elections 2021: The conspiracy theories targeting voters
item.description: One wildly inaccurate claim suggests Germany does not actually exist.

item.title: Spying concerns fuel the market for more secure tech
item.description: Revelations about spyware have spurred interest in more secure phones and software.

item.title: Changing China: Xi Jinping's effort to return to socialism
item.description: China has not been very socialist for years, but the Communist Party looks set to change that.

item.title: The edible insects coming to a supermarket near you
item.description: A number of firms are now farming locusts and mealworms for human consumption.

item.title: Thousands remain at Haitian migrant camp in Texas
item.description: Local officials have struggled to provide food and sanitation to the Haitian migrants.

item.title: Angela Merkel: What will Germans miss about the chancellor?
item.description: BBC Europe editor Katya Adler takes a road trip to find out how Germans will remember their chancellor.

item.title: Hereâ€™s a handful of facts about sign language
item.description: Sign language is an important way of communicating especially for the deaf community, but how much do you know about it?

item.title: Melbourne earthquake: Australians react to rare quake that rattled country
item.description: One resident thought the 5.9 magnitude quake was just his neighbours doing an intense workout.

item.title: Life at 50C: Heat hitting home in Australia
item.description: Cities like Sydney are already experiencing extremely hot days because of climate change.
